00022 #define MAX_BACKEND_SESSION 128

00024 #define ERROR_BREAK(client_sfd, send_val, send_val_len, type_val) do {  \
00025     (type_val) = 0;                                                \
00026     Socket_Send((client_sfd), (send_val), (send_val_len)); \
00027 } while (0)
00028 
00029 #define FIND_RQ(cq, stat) do{\
00030     FIND_Q(RQ, cq, isjob, stat); \
00031 }while(0)
00032 
00033 #define FIND_WTQ(cq, stat) do{\
00034     FIND_Q(WTQ, cq, isjob, stat); \
00035 }while(0)
00036 
00037 #define FIND_WTQPID(cq, stat) do{\
00038     FIND_Q(WTQ, cq, pid, stat); \
00039 }while(0)
00040 
00041 #define FIND_Q(type, cq, table, stat) do{\
00042     type *rq_head = (cq);             \
00043     do{                             \
00044         if(rq_head->table==(stat)) break; \
00045         rq_head = rq_head->next;            \
00046     }while(rq_head!=(cq));                  \
00047     (cq) = rq_head;                       \
00048 }while(0)

00051 typedef enum {
00052     JOB_FREE=0,  /* default 0 ,it's 1 has a job, 2 working */
00053     JOB_HAS,
00054     JOB_WORKING
00055 } RING_JOB_STATE;
00056 
00057 typedef enum {
00058     NT_FREE=0,  /* default 0 ,it's 1 has a job, 2 working */
00059     NT_HAS,
00060     NT_WORKING
00061 } NOTIFY_TOKEN_STATE;
00062 
00063 
00064 /* main thread call it , and get one rq to child thread*/
00065 typedef struct {
00066     pthread_t thread_id;        /* token thread ID */
00067     struct event_base *base;    /* libevent headle */
00068     struct event notify_event;  /* 通知事件，主线程通过这个事件通知worker线程有新连接 */
00069 
00070 } LIBEVENT_TOKEN_THREAD;
00071 
00072 /* token thread call it , and get one rq to work thread*/
00073 typedef struct {
00074     pthread_t thread_id;        /* token thread ID */
00075     struct event_base *base;    /* libevent headle */
00076     struct event notify_event;  /* 通知事件，主线程通过这个事件通知worker线程有新连接 */
00077     int notify_read_fd;    /*   通知事件关联的读fd，这和下面的notify_send_fd是一对管道，具体使用后面讲 */
00078     int notify_write_fd;     /*     通知事件关联的写fd，后面讲 */
00079     int no;
00080     
00081 } LIBEVENT_WORK_THREAD;
00082 
00083 /* a client item  */
00084 typedef struct frontend_conn_item FC_ITEM;
00085 struct frontend_conn_item{
00086     int ffd;    /* frontend connect fd */
00087     double ctime;  /* start time and for overtime */ 
00088 };
00089 
00090 /* a ring connect queue  */
00091 typedef struct ring_queue RQ;
00092 struct ring_queue{
00093     FC_ITEM *frontend; 
00094     RING_JOB_STATE isjob;
00095     RQ *next; 
00096 };

00098 typedef struct work_thread_queue WTQ;
00099 struct work_thread_queue{
00100     RING_JOB_STATE isjob; 
00101     pthread_t pid;
00102     int no;
00103     SESSION_SLOTS *slots[MAX_BACKEND_SESSION];
00104     RQ *rq_item;
00105     WTQ *next;
00106 };

00112     /*conn   *next;      Used for generating a list of conn structures 
00113  *     LIBEVENT_THREAD *thread;  Pointer to the thread object serving this connection */
00114 };
